bio.intro: Hello! I'm {name}, a full stack web developer with over 5 years of experience in creating modern web and mobile applications.
bio.passion: My passion for development started with a simple curiosity for technology, which has turned into a career dedicated to creating innovative and high-performance digital solutions.
bio.specialization: I specialize in developing elegant user interfaces and robust backend architectures. My approach combines technical expertise, creativity and meticulous attention to detail.
bio.hobby: When I'm not coding, you'll probably find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the community.
